question: Which Insurance company has launched the AI based tool called IDEAS?
explanation:
Indiaâ€™s third largest non-life private insurer, HDFC ERGO General Insurance has launched the Artificial Intelligence (AI) based tool called IDEAS (Intelligent Damage detection Estimation and Assessment Solution) motor insurance claims.
The AI tool uses Neural Network image processing and Analytics, Machine Learning and Natural Language for assessment damage and calculations of motor claims.
